snippet: The communications system for an American deep-sea submersible used in the search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 broke down.
abstract: Communications system for American deep-sea submersible being used in the search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 breaks down, forcing the Australian vessel that had been towing it to head back to port.
lead_paragraph: The communications system for an American deep-sea submersible used in the search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 broke down.

headline.main: Malfunction Causes New Setback in Search for Missing Jet
